attributes.action: Introduce compulsary Driving test to include Eyesight & full Medical for over 70's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As drivers get older their health, eyesight and judgement becomes worse. At present anybody over 70 wishing to continue driving only has to sign a declaration of health for an extension to their driving license. People are reluctant to accept that they are not as safe as they once were. We need to ensure that not only the young are targetted for road safety but all drivers
